creator: jatty.xs@gmail.com
text: At present there is no plugin or utility which supports Execution of Jmeter scripts using cucumber.

creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
text:
Hello,
Could you give more details on the possible usage and requirement of this ?
Thanks

creator: jatty.xs@gmail.com
text:
I Need to write scenarios in BDD (Cucumber) for Rest API testing... 
As per my knowledge Jmeter is best tool for Rest API testing but does not support BDD.
